alwaysLast.message: Always put opening tabs to the latest position.

bringToFront.message: Always bring opening tab to front.

desc.message: Open new tabs at last position and focus them. Allow to save/restore windows and tabs.

contextOpenBackground.description: context menu for opening tab in background
contextOpenBackground.message: open link in a new background tab

contextOpenForeground.description: context menu for opening tab in foreground
contextOpenForeground.message: open link in a new foreground tab
